dict.string: Tidepool uses your location to show your own approximate presence ring, render nearby interest heatmaps, and help you discover places that match your interests. We never share your precise location.
Tidepool uses location in the background to update presence and heatmaps when you opt in. We never share your precise location.
Tidepool may use your photos' location tags (if you opt in) to infer place categories and improve interest heatmaps. Photos themselves never leave your device.
Tidepool may save images only for features you explicitly use (like exports). No photos are uploaded without your consent.
